Description:
Regulatory AffairsSupport Product Registration, re-registration, change notification and related license applications & maintenance.
Assist in product lifecycle management activities (labeling changes, new regulations assessment and preparation, CPDS, promotional material reviews)
Assist in local administrative and coordination activities e.g., collection & archival of licenses/ permit, invoice & payment tracking and follow up, operational support etc.Other Regulatory ActivitiesResponsible for maintenance of RA procedures, work instructions, and/or job aids in coordination with the process owners
Support development, implementation, and maintenance of RA metrics to help drive performance.
Regulatory support to local teams
Support other duties as and when assignedAlcon is an Equal Opportunity Employer and takes pride in maintaining a diverse environment.
